product_name: Victorinox Travel Sentry Combo Lock Set - Package of 2
long_description: Confidently keep your luggage secure with the Victorinox Travel Sentry Combo Lock set, which features 2 Travel Sentry(R) approved locks that let inspectors access luggage without destroying locks. Durable cast zinc construction; rubber enhancements provide a soft grip. Sized to fit through locking zipper sliders on luggage and briefcases. 3-digit combination can be reset as needed. Includes 2 locks.
short_description: Confidently keep your luggage secure with the Victorinox Travel Sentry Combo Lock set, which features 2 Travel Sentry(R) approved locks that let inspectors access luggage without destroying locks.
